channel.title: AOE tournament
channel.description:
So Speljohan is hosting another aoe 2 tournament and we've got about 13 people so far who want to play, though probably less people will turn up.
It's going to be a load of fun so if you wanna join then come on irc. We're starting in about 3 hours so hurry up if you wanna come along.
[ul][li]Kick off at 17:00 GMT[/li] [li]Join #mopar irc to play[/li] [li]We can set you up with the correct version of AOE[/li] [li]We are going to be using mumble and if you want the address come to irc[/li][/ul]
edit - winner will receive a cock* to the anus
[size=5pt]*must supply your own cock[/size]

item.title: AOE tournament
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Radeon:

When’s the next one?

It’s pretty much finished for today anyway (started at 5PM, now 7:53am next day). Join irc.quakenet.org #ao2derp if there is a game it’ll be said on there (maybe #mopar as well).

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Was an interesting first game, I managed to somehow obtain a total military score of 0.

yakman pretty much dominated that game.
